attributes.action: Ban MPs profiting on the sale of homes paid for by tax payer funded mortgages
attributes.background: It is utterly morally unacceptable that MP'S should be able buy second homes with tax payer funded mortgages then later sell them on at a huge profit while millions are struggling to get in the property ladder and are still feeling the squeeze of  government austerity.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: 

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
